prompt: Design a flashcards study page with a luxurious, elegant aesthetic featuring a deep navy background with a subtle gold shimmer effect. Center a flashcard as a rectangular card with rounded corners, gold borders, and a cream fill, displaying the question or answer in a sophisticated serif font. Place a flip button below the card, styled as a gold rectangular button with a subtle shine effect. Position navigation arrows on the cardâ€™s sides, styled as elegant gold chevrons. At the top, show a progress indicator as a gold horizontal bar with 'Card 1 of 10' text in a refined font. Include a header with the title 'Art History' in a cursive font, with settings and menu icons in the top-right corner styled as gold ornaments. At the bottom, add a row of buttons for shuffle, restart, and favorite, styled as gold-bordered buttons with a cream fill. Use a luxurious, opulent design with smooth transitions and a navy-and-gold color scheme.
